name: Alone? (itch) (Sujal)
description:
This game was a submission to Brackeys Game Jam! Theme-Stronger Together(had only 3  days to work on the game)

In this game, you are a mushroom and you need to find another mushroom. Because Stronger Together!

But there is a twist!

Not only you have to find a pink mushroom, but make level your self!

Using numbers from 0-9 you can create your own map! As big as you want. Whooo!

Create levels! Play them! Share them with your friends!

The controls, Map design mechanism, functionality will be published as a devlog below. Let's see if Level Designer and Player can be STRONGER TOGETHER✌️ Join our discord for More Game stuff!
